Klasse TaskFactory

java.lang.Object
Project.logic.TaskFactory
public class TaskFactory extends Object
The TaskFactory class provides a factory method for creating different types of tasks. It uses the createTask method to generate a task instance based on the specified type.

  • Methodendetails

    • createTask

      public static Task createTask(String type, String title, String description, int priority, LocalDate dueDate)
      Creates a new task based on the specified type.
      Parameter:
      type - A String representing the type of the task (e.g., "work" or "personal").
      title - A String representing the title of the task.
      description - A String providing a description of the task.
      priority - An int representing the priority level of the task (1 is high, 5 is low).
      dueDate - A LocalDate indicating the due date of the task.
      Gibt zurück:
      A Task object corresponding to the specified type.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified type is invalid.
